channel.title: If somebody could just help me!
channel.description: okay so i would like to get into coding i know the basics i know my way around a source but i dont want to like just download a source+client change home location npc's etc etc i want somebody to like help me with some tips like getting to be better.? create my own project to release to everybody if anyone would be willing to just give it a shot you can message me on here or add me on skype:austingetsbabes it would be awesome guys thank you so much happy scaping

item.title: If somebody could just help me!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You’re not going to “Create your own project” this early into the game. That’d be way to complex for you to understand or even get into.

You should first start by understanding the language the server’s are written in, which is Java.

Luckily for you, Oracle has put out plenty of tutorials and information on the language, all you have to do is read it and learn it.
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/getStarted/index.html <The start of the tutorials.
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/index.html <The index of all their tutorials.
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/reallybigindex.html < Literally all of the tutorials.

Read full topic
item.source: If somebody could just help me!
